quote: For every minute you remain angry, you give up sixty seconds of peace of mind.
name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: A man who has never made a woman angry is a failure in life.
name: Christopher Morley

quote: Speak when you are angry - and you'll make the best speech you'll ever regret.
name: Laurence J. Peter

quote: You will not be punished for your anger, you will be punished by your anger.
name: Buddha

quote: I don't usually lose my temper, but if I get angry, it's true - I'm scary.
name: Eva Mendes

quote: Discussion is an exchange of knowledge; an argument an exchange of ignorance.
name: Robert Quillen

quote: People won't have time for you if you are always angry or complaining.
name: Stephen Hawking

quote: When anger rises, think of the consequences.
name: Confucius

quote: Silence is one of the hardest arguments to refute.
name: Josh Billings

quote: To be angry is to revenge the faults of others on ourselves.
name: Alexander Pope

quote: When angry, count to four; when very angry, swear.
name: Mark Twain

quote: Anger and intolerance are the enemies of correct understanding.
name: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: Anger is the enemy of non-violence and pride is a monster that swallows it up.
name: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: I shall allow no man to belittle my soul by making me hate him.
name: Booker T. Washington

quote: Bitterness is like cancer. It eats upon the host. But anger is like fire. It burns it all clean.
name: Maya Angelou

quote: When angry count to ten before you speak. If very angry, count to one hundred.
name: Thomas Jefferson

quote: A man that studieth revenge keeps his own wounds green.
name: Francis Bacon

quote: The opposite of anger is not calmness, its empathy.
name: Mehmet Oz

quote: You reclaim your power by loving what you were once taught to hate.
name: Bryant H. McGill

quote: Depression, suffering and anger are all part of being human.
name: Janet Fitch

quote: Violence is the last refuge of the incompetent.
name: Isaac Asimov

quote: Everybody has a breaking point. It's tough to ignore the impulse to respond with anger.
name: Andrew Shaffer

quote: While seeking revenge, dig two graves - one for yourself.
name: Douglas Horton

quote: Heaven has no rage like love to hatred turned, nor hell a fury like a woman scorned.
name: William Congreve

quote: Anger is a wind which blows out the lamp of the mind.
name: Robert Green Ingersoll

quote: Grab the broom of anger and drive off the beast of fear.
name: Zora Neale Hurston

quote: Never go to bed mad. Stay up and fight.
name: Phyllis Diller

quote: Reacting in anger or annoyance will not advance one's ability to persuade.
name: Ruth Bader Ginsburg

quote: Hatred, anger, and violence can destroy us: the politics of polarization is dangerous.
name: Rahul Gandhi

quote: Sometimes, you have to get angry to get things done.
name: Ang Lee

quote: Every time you get angry, you poison your own system.
name: Alfred A. Montapert

quote: Boxing gave me a voice to express the anger I felt for where I came from.
name: Gerry Cooney

quote: Anger dwells only in the bosom of fools.
name: Albert Einstein

quote: Hatred is an affair of the heart; contempt that of the head.
name: Arthur Schopenhauer

quote: Anger is energising. The opposite of anger is depression, which is anger turned inward.
name: Gloria Steinem

quote: When one burns one's bridges, what a very nice fire it makes.
name: Dylan Thomas

quote: Anger, if not restrained, is frequently more hurtful to us than the injury that provokes it.
name: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quote: I get angry about things, then go on and work.
name: Toni Morrison

quote: Revenge and retaliation always perpetuate the cycle of anger, fear and violence.
name: Coretta Scott King

quote: Whatever is begun in anger ends in shame.
name: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Anger is never without a reason, but seldom with a good one.
name: Benjamin Franklin

quote: He who angers you conquers you.
name: Elizabeth Kenny

quote: You must have anger, as rightful wrath is what makes you create your own ethical standards.
name: Kamal Haasan

quote: Do not meddle in the affairs of Wizards, for they are subtle and quick to anger.
name: J. R. R. Tolkien

quote: A broken bone can heal, but the wound a word opens can fester forever.
name: Jessamyn West

quote: Anger is as a stone cast into a wasp's nest.
name: Pope Paul VI

quote: The poor monkey, quietly seated on the ground, seemed to be in sore trouble at this display of anger.
name: Henry Walter Bates

quote: There are two things a person should never be angry at, what they can help, and what they cannot.
name: Plato

quote: From my anger, frustration, and hurt, I wrote the short story that would later become 'The Hate U Give.'
name: Angie Thomas

quote: Let us not look back in anger, nor forward in fear, but around in awareness.
name: James Thurber

quote: A man who has not passed through the inferno of his passions has never overcome them.
name: Carl Jung

quote: The flame of anger, bright and brief, sharpens the barb of love.
name: Walter Savage Landor

quote: We boil at different degrees.
name: Clint Eastwood

quote: Extremism thrives amid ignorance and anger, intimidation and cowardice.
name: Hillary Clinton

quote: Getting angry doesn't solve anything.
name: Grace Kelly

quote: Anger begets more anger, and forgiveness and love lead to more forgiveness and love.
name: Mahavira

quote: Anger cannot be dishonest.
name: Marcus Aurelius

quote: There's nothing wrong with anger provided you use it constructively.
name: Wayne Dyer

quote: A very powerful mechanism to get elected is to play on anger and pick those wedge issues.
name: Justin Trudeau

quote: Fear is the only true enemy, born of ignorance and the parent of anger and hate.
name: Edward Albert

quote: The best remedy for a short temper is a long walk.
name: Joseph Joubert

quote: Everybody kind of perceives me as being angry. It's not anger, it's motivation.
name: Roger Clemens

quote: I get angry at a principle, not a person.
name: Norman Schwarzkopf

quote: Pain is pain, hurt is hurt, fear is fear, anger is anger, and it has no color.
name: Iyanla Vanzant

quote: There's a lot of bitterness, there's a lot of anger out there. We all have to work hard to heal those wounds.
name: Allen Boyd

quote: I don't have the feeling of being motivated by anger, revenge or frustration.
name: Agnes Obel

quote: All through life I've harbored anger rather than expressed it at the moment.
name: Jessica Lange

quote: I think photographers are too polite. There is not enough anger in photography; it's pretty much trivialized.
name: Duane Michals

quote: Anger is never without an argument, but seldom with a good one.
name: George Savile

quote: You cannot get ahead while you are getting even.
name: Dick Armey

quote: Genuine forgiveness does not deny anger but faces it head-on.
name: Alice Miller

quote: I'm generally quite an angry person, and I like to channel my anger toward something creative.
name: Sharmeen Obaid-Chinoy

quote: I have sadness in me. I have anger in me. I have heartbreak in me.
name: Ellen DeGeneres

quote: How much more grievous are the consequences of anger than the causes of it.
name: Marcus Aurelius

quote: One should not lose one's temper unless one is certain of getting more and more angry to the end.
name: William Butler Yeats

quote: Obama and his attack dogs have nothing but hate and anger in their hearts and spew it whenever possible.
name: Donald Trump

quote: Get mad, then get over it.
name: Colin Powell

quote: The greatest remedy for anger is delay.
name: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quote: If you get down and quarell everyday, you're saying prayers to the devil, I say.
name: Bob Marley

quote: Anger begins with folly, and ends with repentance.
name: Pythagoras

quote: When I am angry I can pray well and preach well.
name: Martin Luther

quote: The emotions in a song - the anger, aggression - have got to be legitimate.
name: Eminem

quote: Hatred is settled anger.
name: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quote: I do stand up sometimes out of anger. Sometimes the greatest stuff comes from a dark place.
name: Tracy Morgan

quote: Hurt leads to bitterness, bitterness to anger, travel too far that road and the way is lost.
name: Terry Brooks

quote: Anger is like those ruins which smash themselves on what they fall.
name: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quote: No man can think clearly when his fists are clenched.
name: George Jean Nathan

quote: A large part of mankind is angry not with the sins, but with the sinners.
name: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quote: The deferring of anger is the best antidote to anger.
name: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quote: Never do anything when you are in a temper, for you will do everything wrong.
name: Baltasar Gracian

quote: Hatred is inveterate anger.
name: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quote: Love implies anger. The man who is angered by nothing cares about nothing.
name: Edward Abbey

quote: I don't like greed, I don't like ignorance. I really don't like anger. But I love love.
name: David Crosby

quote: Behind every argument is someone's ignorance.
name: Louis D. Brandeis

quote: Anger makes dull men witty, but it keeps them poor.
name: Francis Bacon

quote: I don't feel bitterness, I don't feel anger towards anybody. Fighting is never emotional to me.
name: Conor McGregor

quote: I am too weary to listen, too angry to hear.
name: Daniel Bell

quote: So many people live with anger and unforgiveness, and many of them are Christians.
name: Joyce Meyer

quote: Don't get the impression that you arouse my anger. You see, one can only be angry with those he respects.
name: Richard M. Nixon

quote: If a small thing has the power to make you angry, does that not indicate something about your size?
name: Sydney J. Harris

quote: I'm free from holding personal anger because I can express what I want through my music.
name: Yoko Ono

quote: You know how big love is? Love is big. love can hold anger; love can even hold hatred.
name: Alice Walker

quote: Sometimes it's worse to win a fight than to lose.
name: Billie Holiday

quote: Anger ventilated often hurries towards forgiveness; anger concealed often hardens into revenge.
name: Edward G. Bulwer-Lytton

quote: I've had no problem harnessing anger.
name: Clint Eastwood

quote: Anger and jealousy can no more bear to lose sight of their objects than love.
name: George Eliot

quote: Life is precious and there's not a lot of room for anger.
name: Fran Drescher

quote: The more anger towards the past you carry in your heart, the less capable you are of loving in the present.
name: Barbara De Angelis

quote: I'm always angry. I wake up angry. There is a lot to be angry about. Anger is a positive energy.
name: Thandie Newton

quote: The intoxication of anger, like that of the grape, shows us to others, but hides us from ourselves.
name: John Dryden

quote: Experts say you should never hit your children in anger. When is a good time? When you're feeling festive?
name: Roseanne Barr

quote: A man that does not know how to be angry does not know how to be good.
name: Henry Ward Beecher

quote: It seems to me that election season is just a Petri dish for anger and cynicism.
name: Max Lucado

quote: Violent anger makes me physically ill.
name: Langston Hughes

quote: Keep cool; anger is not an argument.
name: Daniel Webster

quote: Sympathy is something that shouldn't be bestowed upon the Yankees. Apparently it angers them.
name: Bob Feller

quote: Whoever incites anger has a strong insurance against indifference.
name: Philip Stanhope, 4th Earl of Chesterfield

quote: You want to see an angry person? Let me hear a cell phone go off.
name: Jim Lehrer

quote: To rule one's anger is well; to prevent it is better.
name: Tryon Edwards

quote: The anger of a person who is strong, can always bide its time.
name: James Whitcomb Riley

quote: Denial, panic, threats, anger - those are very human responses to feeling guilt.
name: Joshua Oppenheimer

quote: He that would be angry and sin not, must not be angry with anything but sin.
name: John Ruskin

quote: Never contend with a man who has nothing to lose.
name: Baltasar Gracian

quote: Anger is wonderful. It keeps you going. I'm angry about bankers. About the government.
name: Terry Pratchett

quote: I'm too mature to be angry.
name: Jesse Jackson

quote: Somebody hits me, I'm going to hit him back. Even if it does look like he hasn't eaten in a while.
name: Charles Barkley

quote: The injunction to be nice is used to deflect criticism and stifle the legitimate anger of dissent.
name: Malcolm Gladwell

quote: Be calm in arguing; for fierceness makes error a fault, and truth discourtesy.
name: George Herbert

quote: Anger is a short madness.
name: Horace

quote: Lawyers are men who hire out their words and anger.
name: Horace

quote: Do not follow vain desires; for verily he who prospers is preserved from lust, greed and anger.
name: Abu Bakr

quote: I think I have a normal threshold of anger, but it's true that I am, by nature, belligerent.
name: Gore Vidal

quote: Arguments only confirm people in their own opinions.
name: Booth Tarkington

quote: There is nothing that so much gratifies an ill tongue as when it finds an angry heart.
name: Thomas Fuller

quote: Anger is one of the sinews of the soul.
name: Thomas Fuller

quote: An angry man is again angry with himself when he returns to reason.
name: Publilius Syrus

quote: The bare recollection of anger kindles anger.
name: Publilius Syrus

quote: There was never an angry man that thought his anger unjust.
name: Saint Francis de Sales

quote: Never go to bed angry, stay up and fight.
name: William Congreve

quote: When anyone arouses my anger, I will immediately pray for them and regain my peace of soul.
name: Mother Angelica

quote: Ridicule is the first and last argument of a fool.
name: Charles Simmons

quote: I'm not a screamer. I'm confrontational, but I don't think that translates into anger.
name: Rachel Maddow

quote: It is typical of women to fester and ferment over disappointments, slights, annoyances, angers, etc.
name: Laura Schlessinger

quote: I am a danger to myself if I get angry.
name: Oriana Fallaci

quote: You can survive with anger, but you can't live with it forever.
name: Ariel Dorfman

quote: Anger is a momentary madness, so control your passion or it will control you.
name: G. M. Trevelyan

quote: Keep your temper. A decision made in anger is never sound.
name: Ford Frick

quote: Revenge is often like biting a dog because the dog bit you.
name: Austin O'Malley

quote: I don't think anybody should ever touch anybody in anger, ever.
name: Tommy Lee

quote: Anger has a way of seeping into every other emotion and planting itself in there.
name: Dane Cook

quote: I have a lot of anger about my childhood - being hard of hearing and my relationship with my father.
name: Lou Ferrigno

quote: Everybody in America is angry about something.
name: Anthony Braxton

quote: I personally do not believe in politics, hatred, or anger in my musical composition.
name: Horace Silver

quote: Yogis have human emotions, but the thing is not to let anger and doubt become an obsession.
name: Donovan

quote: Sometimes you just need to raise your voice. And sometimes a little anger is necessary, to be honest.
name: Corey Hawkins

quote: Man should forget his anger before he lies down to sleep.
name: Thomas de Quincey

quote: There never was a social change in America without angry people at the heart.
name: Keith Miller

quote: There is not in nature, a thing that makes man so deformed, so beastly, as doth intemperate anger.
name: Alan Bleasdale

quote: Anger is never without an argument, but seldom with a good one.
name: George Savile, 1st Marquess of Halifax

quote: Fair peace becomes men; ferocious anger belongs to beasts.
name: Ovid

quote: Like fragile ice anger passes away in time.
name: Ovid

quote: Anger tears me up inside... My own... or anyone else's.
name: Betty White

quote: When you hold on to anger and unforgiveness, you can't move forward.
name: Mary J. Blige

quote: Anger elicits anger, fear elicits fear, no matter how well meaning we may be.
name: Martha Beck

quote: I don't like anybody to be angry with me. I'd rather have friends.
name: B. B. King

quote: In many ways, anger is a misdirected plea for love.
name: Karen Salmansohn

quote: One of man's greatest obligations is anger.
name: Nikos Kazantzakis

quote: My job is to show my clients that their anger is rarely someone else's fault. It's their flaw.
name: Marshall Goldsmith

quote: I accrued anger from people's low opinion of me and my work, and for the work I might be capable of.
name: Harrison Ford

quote: I want roles without anger and feistiness. I want to show weakness and sadness, some love, some happiness.
name: Marlee Matlin

quote: How often it is that the angry man rages denial of what his inner self is telling him.
name: Frank Herbert

quote: My passion and energy get mistaken for anger.
name: Gary Oldman

quote: When you feel bad, find a person to talk to and cry with, to tell of your anger and other helpless feelings.
name: Clarissa Pinkola Estes

quote: Human anger does not produce the righteousness that God desires.
name: Manny Pacquiao

quote: Anger is a good motivator.
name: James Dyson

quote: He that will be angry for anything will be angry for nothing.
name: Sallust

quote: All who consult on doubtful matters, should be void of hatred, friendship, anger, and pity.
name: Sallust

quote: He best keeps from anger who remembers that God is always looking upon him.
name: B. C. Forbes

quote: Some people can vent their anger, take a breath, and let it go, but I wasn't one of them.
name: Paul Allen

quote: He took over anger to intimidate subordinates, and in time anger took over him.
name: Milan Kundera

quote: I do have anger management issues. Not clinical. Probably no more than most people.
name: Andy Serkis

quote: Relationships based on deals between leaders or ruling elites tend to collapse amid popular anger.
name: Stephen Kinzer

quote: I think anger is a good thing.
name: Steve Bannon

quote: What the media misses is the amount of anger that's out there. Trump didn't create that.
name: Steve Bannon

quote: An angry people cannot create anything that is not imbued with anger.
name: John McAfee

quote: My whole life, people have been saying, Why are you so angry?
name: Fiona Apple

quote: There's a lot of anger in the Twitter-verse, as I've discovered. But there's a lot of love.
name: Joss Whedon

quote: As you get older, you see the world at a different angle, maybe more cynically, but I just bury my anger.
name: Zach Galifianakis

quote: My anger is constructive.
name: Beppe Grillo

quote: The anger and the creativity are so closely intertwined with me, and there's plenty of anger left.
name: Ingmar Bergman

quote: I had a lot of anger because I wasn't happy with the way I had been raised.
name: Patrick Swayze

quote: When terrorism strikes, divisive anger is a natural response.
name: Mohsin Hamid

quote: Anger is not an accepted thing for women. And, you know, I do get angry. I feel it's a very honest emotion.
name: Rosamund Pike

quote: When you fight, anger drives up testosterone in both men and women.
name: Helen Fisher

quote: I'm not someone who feels anger on particular issues.
name: Theresa May

quote: When you learn that a truth is a lie, anger follows.
name: Grace Slick

quote: People are unjust to anger - it can be enlivening and a lot of fun.
name: Philip Roth

quote: Anger in the black community towards Republicans is established and immutable.
name: Bob Beckel

quote: I'm sick of all the hate and anger and stuff like that going on.
name: Rose Namajunas

quote: I grew up with lots of anger, frustration, and violence in my heart.
name: Rose Namajunas

quote: My father was often angry when I was most like him.
name: Lillian Hellman

quote: I don't play pyrotechnic scales. I play about frustration, patience, anger. Music is an extension of my soul.
name: Dick Dale

quote: Anger is a transient hatred; or at least very like it.
name: Robert South

quote: My humour has always come from anger, but I have to make sure I don't just get angry and jump on a soapbox.
name: Carl Hiaasen

quote: Hizb ut-Tahrir spearheaded the radicalization of the 1990s and cultivated an atmosphere of anger.
name: Maajid Nawaz

quote: I think I have more humour in me than anger. But those two things are great bed-fellows, performance-wise.
name: Elaine Stritch

quote: Anger is an emotion, not a compass.
name: Tom Tancredo

quote: I have some anger issues.
name: Bryan Cranston

quote: We have to take our anger and rage and channel it into building, growing, loving, holding each other up.
name: Pramila Jayapal

quote: The most powerful force in American politics is not anger, it's nostalgia.
name: Pete Hamill

quote: Your anger is a gift.
name: Zack de la Rocha

quote: As Christians, we sin with anger because we lack faith in God's ability to provide for or protect us.
name: Eric Metaxas

quote: When a man is wrong and won't admit it, he always gets angry.
name: Thomas Chandler Haliburton

quote: Anger's not a good emotion.
name: Lincoln Chafee

quote: Anger is one way to respond to fear. I say one way because responses are categorically multiple.
name: Mark Z. Danielewski

quote: The character of Robin Hood stands for the deep anger of the dispossessed against the ruling classes.
name: David Farr

quote: I've never felt that anger is a very powerful emotion.
name: John Hurt

quote: There's a lot of anger in 'Queen of Denmark,' and that's me getting political.
name: John Grant

quote: Be modest, humble, simple. Control your anger.
name: Abraham Cahan

quote: Yeah, to me, acting is very therapeutic. I get out a lot of anger and frustration.
name: Diane Kruger

quote: Dying peacefully means to avoid any immediate cause for anger, fear, or strong desire.
name: Lobsang Tenzin

quote: You see all the movies where people say, 'Don't fight out of anger'? They say that for a reason.
name: Donald Cerrone

quote: The anger of lovers renews their love.
name: Terence

quote: I guess I probably make violent films partly because I can't express my anger in my real life very well.
name: Park Chan-wook

quote: Because society would rather we always wore a pretty face, women have been trained to cut off anger.
name: Nancy Friday

quote: Always write angry letters to your enemies. Never mail them.
name: James Fallows

quote: I think that all the anger and cynicism comes from suppressing things that we always wanted.
name: John Lee Hancock

quote: I believe anger is a wasted emotion, and I don't like to waste emotions.
name: Jim Webb

quote: I am not deaf. I hear the anger. I see the dissatisfaction, and I have to go faster.
name: Francois Hollande

quote: I think anger does fuel a successful acting career. To play the great roles, you have to learn how to blaze.
name: Christopher Plummer

quote: When trying to start a company, your enemy isn't criticism, anger or insults. Your enemy is apathy.
name: Gil Penchina

quote: I like people and get along, and I'm afraid to express my anger and my rage.
name: Fisher Stevens

quote: The greatest players use anger as fuel. Michael Jordan played every night with something like road rage.
name: J. R. Moehringer

quote: Verbally, I'm quite fast on my feet. I could embarrass or anger most people if I wanted to.
name: Andrew Marr

quote: Fear usually looks like anger.
name: Krista Tippett

quote: It really shocked me just to hear of the fans' response to 'St. Anger' not having guitar solos.
name: Kirk Hammett

quote: When liberals dismiss all Trump supporters as racists, this only fuels their anger.
name: Stephanie Coontz

quote: What's often not acknowledged about depression is how much anger is in it.
name: Margo Jefferson

quote: Public anger over bank bailouts was as much about fairness as the billions of dollars spent.
name: Nina Easton

quote: Sometimes we equate anger to destructive physical violence, but anger need not be martial.
name: Kamal Haasan

quote: Anger is an expensive luxury in which only men of certain income can indulge.
name: George William Curtis

quote: Anger is so constructive.
name: John Cameron Mitchell

quote: A hungry man is an angry one.
name: Buchi Emecheta

quote: I was shocked at the anger toward me.
name: Bernadine Dohrn

quote: I think anger and laughter are very close to each other, when you think about it.
name: Albert Brooks

quote: My anger with the US was not at first, that they had used that weapon - although that anger came later.
name: Wilfred Burchett

quote: Anger and hate against one we love steels our hearts, but contempt or pity leaves us silent and ashamed.
name: Edgar Rice Burroughs

quote: Being an activist is about getting things done. It's not about standing around shaking your fist in anger.
name: Christine Quinn

quote: Anger can be a problem, but it has tremendous potential, too. It's just figuring out what to do with it.
name: Sean Penn

quote: The thing that started the peace movement in Ireland was anger - my anger. It wasn't anger; it was fury.
name: Betty Williams

quote: When you're not sure your anger is justified, the thing to do is ask yourself exactly where it's coming from.
name: Lynn Coady

quote: I've always turned my anger inwards towards self-destruction.
name: Mackenzie Phillips

quote: Our humor turns our anger into a fine art.
name: Mary Kay Blakely

quote: I have not one shred of anger in my heart against Netanyahu or his wife.
name: Naftali Bennett

quote: Expressing anger is a form of public littering.
name: Willard Gaylin

quote: I feel like we sometimes let our emotions and anger get in the way.
name: Trevor Jackson

quote: Anger is a great force. If you control it, it can be transmuted into a power which can move the whole world.
name: William Shenstone

quote: I vent my anger in the gym, and it calms me down.
name: Samantha Akkineni

quote: I've purged myself of bitterness and anger and remained open to love.
name: Tatum O'Neal

quote: Every progressive movement has been built on the anger, needs, and aspirations of the emerging major class.
name: Guy Standing

quote: Mum had pumped me so full of anger, I couldn't throw it off.
name: Viv Albertine

quote: I am ready to accept all accusations, allegations, anger - but I have to succeed.
name: Boris Trajkovski

quote: Eventually, I moved from a place of anger toward the Jews of Israel toward a place of embrace.
name: Ayman Odeh

quote: I want to understand the anger in the world.
name: John Tiffany

quote: My tastes lean toward the more negative, angry and eclectic.
name: Josh Silver

quote: I don't think I've ever had a conversation with a comedian who stole except for when it's been in anger.
name: Matt Besser

quote: A certain amount of anger doesn't make us less empathetic, less humane, less loving. It just makes us real.
name: Lindsay Duncan

quote: On stage, I find anger at the unfairness of the world easily.
name: Jessica Raine

quote: I suppose there's an anger in all of us. Some hidden rage that you keep at bay.
name: Dominic Cooper

quote: I've spent a lot of time and money trying to keep my anger in control.
name: Yancy Butler

quote: Americans are slow to anger, but once they do get angry, they are impossible to stop.
name: Kathleen Troia McFarland

quote: The Anger Management Tour was another beautiful thing. I loved that tour.
name: Obie Trice

quote: What if you threw a protest and no one showed up? The lack of angst and anger and emotion is a big positive.
name: Jay Alan Sekulow

quote: I want to express myself to feel that what I feel is real. My joy, my pain, my anger.
name: Annabella Sciorra

quote: Sometimes with anger you can be much more dangerous than with skill.
name: Mathieu Amalric

quote: Most men's anger about religion is as if two men should quarrel for a lady they neither of them care for.
name: Edward Wood, 1st Earl of Halifax

quote: It angers me that a timed, planned and paid smearing campaign is run against me in the press.
name: Beny Steinmetz

quote: An angry player can't argue with the back of an umpire who is walking away.
name: Bill Klem

quote: Fear generates anger, and fear generates violence, and those were part of what built the Saudi state.
name: Robert Lacey

quote: The world needs anger. The world often continues to allow evil because it isn't angry enough.
name: Bede Jarrett

quote: I think, often, when you are in just a lot of pain, it comes out as anger.
name: Nell Hudson
